posts.post_content: Any help on finding the captioned card much appreciated.  The search has been long.  If I can find one my quest will be over.  There is but Uzit known and that belonged to our beloved and late Teddy Z.

7 of them exist between PSA and SGC, apparently. One sold in December in a PWCC auction, a PSA 3. 

[url]https://www.pwccmarketplace.com/premier-auction/12079[/url]

best of luck
